sanskrit: अभयं सत्त्वसंशुद्धिर्ज्ञानयोगव्यवस्थितिः। दानं दमश्च यज्ञश्च स्वाध्यायस्तप आर्जवम्॥
transliteration: abhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir jñāna-yoga-vyavasthitiḥ | dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam ||
english: Fearlessness, purity of heart, steadfastness in knowledge and yoga, charity, self-control, sacrifice, study of scriptures, austerity, and honesty.
hindi: निर्भयता, अंतःकरण की शुद्धि, ज्ञानयोग में स्थिति, दान, दम, यज्ञ, स्वाध्याय, तप और सरलता।
principle: Divine qualities lead to liberation and mental well-being.

sanskrit: अहिंसा सत्यमक्रोधस्त्यागः शान्तिरपैशुनम्। दया भूतेष्वलोलुप्त्वं मार्दवं ह्रीरचापलम्॥
transliteration: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam | dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam ||
english: Non-violence, truthfulness, freedom from anger, renunciation, peacefulness, aversion to fault-finding, compassion for all beings, freedom from greed, gentleness, modesty, and steadiness.
hindi: अहिंसा, सत्य, अक्रोध, त्याग, शांति, निंदा न करना, प्राणियों पर दया, लोभ का अभाव, कोमलता, लज्जा और अचपलता।
principle: Cultivating positive qualities transforms character and spiritual wellness.

sanskrit: तेजः क्षमा धृतिः शौचमद्रोहो नातिमानिता। भवन्ति सम्पदं दैवीमभिजातस्य भारत॥
transliteration: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā | bhavanti sampadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata ||
english: Vigor, forgiveness, fortitude, purity, freedom from malice, and absence of pride - these are the qualities of one born with divine nature, O Bharata.
hindi: तेज, क्षमा, धृति, शौच, अद्रोह और अभिमान का अभाव - ये दैवी संपदा वाले के लक्षण हैं।
principle: Divine qualities define a balanced and healthy character.

english: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 16, Verse 4 teaches wisdom on divine demoniac natures.
hindi: भगवद्गीता अध्याय 16, श्लोक 4 में divine demoniac natures पर ज्ञान दिया गया है।
principle: Core teaching from Chapter 16 - Daivasura Sampad Vibhaga Yoga
